name: Goods & Services Tax – Is it “Udyoga Mukhi & Samaaj Mukhi?”
content: Dear Sir/Madam, Warm greetings from Department of Business Administration, Rani Channamma University, Belagavi, Karnataka, India. We are glad to inform you that the Dept. is organizing National Seminar on Goods & Services Tax – Is it “Udyoga Mukhi & Samaaj Mukhi?” on 27th March, 2018\. As a responsive Organization, it is our humble effort to bring all the stakeholders i.e. Researchers, Chartered Accountant, Businessmen, Academicians, Policy Makers, Regulatory Bodies, etc on a single platform to discuss and develop policy guidelines and action plan about GST for achieving sustainable economic development of India. It is in this context that we solicit the pleasure of your contribution to Seminar in the form of Research Papers. For further information please click the link “NSGST 2018” on Rani Channamma University website www.rcub.ac.in OR website of Jain Degree College http://bgm.jaincollege.ac.in. We also request you to kindly forward this mail to your faculty members/ research scholars/ colleagues and encourage them to participate in the Seminar. We expect your abstract and full paper to reach us at the earliest. Email: nsgst2018@gmail.com OR drnmrrcub@gmail.com Website: www.rcub.ac.in OR http://bgm.jaincollege.ac.in Looking forward to hearing from you soon Warm Regards, Dr. N Maruti Rao, Organizing Secretary, NSGST 2018 Dept of Business Administration Rani Channamma University, Belagavi
